oai_dc:dc.dc:title: A One-Pot Deprotection and Intramolecular Oxa-Michael Addition to Access Angular Trioxatriquinanes
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: RAMAKRISHNA, K
KALIAPPAN, KP

oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An efficient one-pot deprotection-oxa-Michael addition strategy has been used to synthesize a few trioxatriquinanes starting from commercially available sugars.
